column3: Latest;Prey Nup District: On the evening of August 16
column8: a violent conflict broke out between Hort Phalla
column11: causing head injuries to the latter.------After the suspect walked over her rice field
column13: the victim pulled a plastic pipe and hit the (younger) woman. The suspect then retaliated by attacking the older woman with a rice cutting sickle.------The victim was hospitalized
column14: while the woman named Hort Phalla was brought in for questioning by police and detained to build a case. ------AREY
